docs.text: About XEM POS XEM POS is a Multipurpose Point of Sale software, which supports multiple business types like Grocery & Supermarkets, Pharmacy, Mobile Stores, Fashion Boutiques, Bakeries and Restaurants. Using XEM POS you can manage your in-store and online operations from one spot while also launching your brand in new markets. Features Easy to Use Multipurpose Weekly Cloud Backups Inventory and Stock Management Barcode Scan and Generation Purchases and Sales Report Expenses Report Client Management Browse on any Device Requirements Latest version of WordPress Memory Limit : 8M Max Upload Size : 8M
